overview: We all have dreams. Devyn Foster's are about Chaz Carlton and Franco. He dreamily observes, then he joins in. And leaves them both begging for more. Cort Stevens has dreams too. About Devyn. In a sauna and shower, amidst the steam of hot sex. Grant Larsen dreams of Josh Powell, taking him on an inflatable, by a sparkling blue pool. And Sean Diamond with Rod Majors is a wet dream in and of itself. We'll leave a mint on the pillow...
title: Wet Dreams
